title: [Large-scale] Sustainability and Future Scenarios Exploration: Mathematical Modeling Project Using Applied Drama

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics and statistics knowledge, general understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: Structuring collaborative problem-solving and role-play-based learning environments grounded in digital device support

learning_goals: Learners can creatively analyze future sustainability scenarios through applied drama techniques.
By utilizing mathematical modeling, learners simulate social/ecological crisis scenarios and propose solutions.
Based on role cognition, learners can argue sustainability issues from the perspectives of diverse stakeholders.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
